hero.sub_headline: Drive smarter decisions with actionable insights. Elevate your business processes by transforming feedback into meaningful data.

features.headline: Tools to Empower Your Form Building
features.sub_headline: Elevate your form-building experience with innovative tools and insightful analytics.
features.editor_description: Craft personalized forms effortlessly with our intuitive, scenario-based editor.
features.analytics_description: Gain powerful insights to monitor performance and refine your forms for success.
features.export_description: Export submissions and analytics with ease, empowering offline decision-making anytime.

hiw.headline: How It Works
hiw.sub_headline: Easily create, customize, and manage forms in a few simple steps.
hiw.step1_description: Effortlessly create a form tailored to your specific needs.
hiw.step2_description: Personalize your form and publish it with just a few clicks.
hiw.step3_description: Distribute your form easily via link or QR code.
hiw.step4_description: Track and organize submissions from a central dashboard.
hiw.step5_description: Analyze form performance using our powerful analytics tools.
hiw.step6_description: Download submissions and analytics for offline review.
